about_the_game:
You will meet five local girls during your business adventure, this DLC will replace the standard apparence by 5 gorgeous and sexy girls designed by Tsirpa - @PonDkUn_Gzwill.

DLC Content:
  • New 18+ main screen: The main screen adapts to you progress in the game.
  • Local screen with 2 different levels for each girls.
  • Ingame sounds are replaced by Lemonjolly japan voices.

content_descriptors.notes:
Players can unlock locals, those locals are hidden at level 0, in swimsuit at level 1, naked/without swinsuit at level 2.
Nothing else. Mangas style.
Only adult characters, women only.

detailed_description:
You will meet five local girls during your business adventure, this DLC will replace the standard apparence by 5 gorgeous and sexy girls designed by Tsirpa - @PonDkUn_Gzwill.

DLC Content:
  • New 18+ main screen: The main screen adapts to you progress in the game.
  • Local screen with 2 different levels for each girls.
  • Ingame sounds are replaced by Lemonjolly japan voices.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS/Manjaro KDE 18.1.4 Juhraya/Linux Mint 19.3
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Better with than without
  • Additional Notes: Tested & validated by the great r/linuxgaming community

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6 or lower
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Better with than without
  • Additional Notes: Please try even if you are lower.

name: Beach Love Shop - Adult skins for locals

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: You must activate your speaker :)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This DLC will change the appearance of the locals with new visuals and main screen!
